skills.title: Web Development
skills.description: Skilled in developing full-stack web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React, Node.js, and Express.

skills.title: Data Science & Machine Learning

skills.title: Cloud Computing

portfolio.title: Music Subscription Churn Prediction
portfolio.description: A data-driven project predicting subscription churn using Flask, PostgreSQL, and machine learning models

portfolio.title: Cryptocurrency Illegal Transactions Prediction
portfolio.description: Applied machine learning techniques to detect fraudulent activities in cryptocurrency.

portfolio.title: Game Development
